scripts.start: npm run build && http-server . -o -c-1 & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-less
scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p static/build/lib && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-holder && npm run copy-bootstrap
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p static/build/js && browserify -t babelify static/js/index.js -o static/build/js/index.js
scripts.build-less: mkdir -p static/build/css && lessc static/less/index.less > static/build/css/index.css && echo 'Less compiled'
scripts.build: ulimit -n 512 && npm install && npm run copy-libs && npm run build-less && npm run build-js
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-less
scripts.dist-static: cp -r static/build dist/static/ && cp -r static/css/ dist/static/css/ && cp -r static/img/ dist/static/img/
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/static/build && npm run dist-static && cp -r index.html dist/ && cp CNAME dist/ && cp -r templates/ dist/templates/
